# NSLayoutConstraint.Relation.equal

**Case**

The constraint requires the first attribute to be exactly equal to the modified second attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
case equal
```

## Constants

- **NSLayoutConstraint.Relation.lessThanOrEqual**: The constraint requires the first attribute to be less than or equal to the modified second attribute.
- **NSLayoutConstraint.Relation.greaterThanOrEqual**: The constraint requires the first attribute to be greater than or equal to the modified second attribute.
